feature.Overall extra description: The image depicts a simple geometric shape, a triangle, with a ruler and a pencil. The ruler is positioned at the top left of the triangle, and the pencil is positioned at the top right. Both the ruler and the pencil are black and have a solid appearance. The triangle is outlined in black and has a size of 0.5. The ruler and the pencil are positioned in such a way that they form a triangle with the triangle they are placed on. The overall style of the image is simple and minimalistic, using only black and white colors.
